Name: Chuckie Egg 2017 Challenges
About the game: Summertime means relaxation, vacations, ice cream, cold drinks, and for Harry: Summer School! And what's in this Challenge exactly? It's twelve all-new levels for Harry to run, jump and dodge his way through. There's more ostriches, more ladders, more platforms, and yes, more Bertha! With a mix of level difficulties, combined with updated music and art, Chuckie Egg 2017 Challenges is egg-catching fun! Try evading Bertha on levels like The Pit and One-on-One, or do your best to avoid groups of Bertha's ostrich henchmen in the levels Outnumbered and The Factory. Chuckie Egg 2017 Challenges is a true test of your retro platforming skills! Features: - 12 brand new levels to solve, each with their own unique name - Survivor Run Game Mode. Can you complete all the Challenge levels with only one life? - Normal and Hard difficulty modes to test even the best platformer wizard - Full controller support and keyboard controls (user configurable) - Window and Full screen display modes - Five new Steam achievements Chuckie Egg 2017 Challenges is a stand-alone expansion pack and does not require you to own Chuckie Egg 2017 to play.
